name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

description: A peculiar island in the Grand Line where everything - animals, plants, and geographical features - is extraordinarily elongated. The island is inhabited by nomadic tribes who migrate in 10-year cycles.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Long Ring Long Land
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at this strange island and begin exploring its unusual elongated environment.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the Long Ring Long Land Arc and introduces one of the most unique islands in One Piece.

keyEvents.title: Meeting Tonjit on Long Ring Long Land
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Usopp, and Chopper discover Tonjit stuck on stilts for 10 years on this island, learning about the nomadic tribes that inhabit it.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the island's culture and sets up the episode's main events.

keyEvents.title: Davy Back Fight Challenge Issued
keyEvents.description: Foxy challenges the Straw Hats to a Davy Back Fight on this island, beginning the arc's main conflict.
keyEvents.significance: The island becomes the battleground for the Davy Back Fight games.

geographicalFeatures: Bamboo forests with unusually tall bamboo
Long Ring formation (10 islands connected in a ring shape, though this is revealed later)
historicalSignificance: Home to nomadic tribes that migrate every 10 years, creating a unique cultural system. The island's geography makes it an ideal location for Davy Back Fight competitions.
culturalNotes: The island is inhabited by nomadic tribes who follow 10-year migration cycles
All fauna and flora on the island exhibit extreme elongation
Traditional location for Davy Back Fight pirate competitions

statusHistory.description: Island discovered and explored by Straw Hat Pirates

sources.title: Long Ring Long Land - One Piece Wiki

description: A lawless pirate town on Jaya Island in the Grand Line, known for being a haven for pirates and criminals.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Punishes Bellamy in Mock Town
keyEvents.description: Donquixote Doflamingo appears in Mock Town to punish Bellamy and Sarquiss for losing to Luffy, using his puppet control abilities to force them to fight each other.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the consequences of Bellamy's defeat and demonstrates Doflamingo's ruthless nature and devil fruit powers.

historicalSignificance: Previously featured as the location where Luffy and Bellamy fought, and where the Straw Hats learned about Sky Island.
culturalNotes: Lawless pirate haven where pirates gather and recruit
Known for its rough atmosphere and dangerous inhabitants
